attributes.action: Provide better care for the eldely by care companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Care for the elderly is in the private sector. It is all about profit for the managers. The carers have a work load that they are unable to cope with and are paid pittance. The goverment wash thier hands of the elderly. Not their problem.

rejection.details: Please rephrase your title and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
